transport.question: I have wheels and go 'vroom vroom'! What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 You can ride in me to go to the park.
🚦 I stop at red lights.
🔑 You need a grown-up to drive me.

transport.question: I float on water and can take you on a trip. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I might have a horn that goes 'toot toot!'
⚓ You might see me at a dock.
🛳️ I am bigger than a kayak.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people far away. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I have wings but I'm not a bird.
💺 You sit inside me to travel.
✈️ I can be very, very big.

transport.question: I go on tracks and can carry many people. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I travel on metal rails.
📣 I often make a 'choo choo' sound.
🚝 Some of me can travel underground.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you push with your feet using pedals. What am I?

hints.text: 👧 You need to balance to ride me.
🔔 I might have a bell to ring.
🚲 You can ride me in the park or on the street.

transport.question: I can fly straight up and down and have spinning blades on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I am smaller than an airplane.
🏥 Sometimes I am used to rescue people.
🪶 My blades go 'whop whop whop'.

transport.question: I take lots of people to school and have a driver. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I am often yellow.
🎒 I have lots of seats.
🚌 I stop to pick you up.

transport.question: I zoom through space and sometimes land on the moon. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I have a pointy nose.
👨‍🚀 Astronauts ride in me.
🌌 I need lots of fuel to fly.

transport.question: I have a handle you twist to make me go, and two wheels, but no pedals and an engine. What am I?

hints.text: 🛵 You sit on me to ride.
⛽ I need fuel to make me go.
😎 Some people can do tricks on me.

transport.question: I help put out fires. I am red and have a siren. What am I?

hints.text: 🚒 I carry firefighters.
🚨 I make a loud 'wee-ooh, wee-ooh' sound.
💦 I spray water to stop fires.

animal.question: I meow and like to chase string. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I love to drink milk.
🧶 I purr when you pet me.
🐈‍⬛ I have soft fur and whiskers.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I like to chew on bones.
🎾 I love to play fetch.
🐾 I am a loyal friend.

animal.question: I quack and swim in a pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🧡 I have webbed feet.
🌾 I eat seeds and plants.
🦆 My babies are called ducklings.

animal.question: I moo and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I eat grass in the field.
🐄 I have black and white spots.
🔔 Some people put a bell around my neck.

animal.question: I say 'neigh' and you can ride on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐴 I like to run fast.
🥕 I enjoy eating carrots.
🤠 People often ride me on farms or in rodeos.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love peanuts.
🐘 I am very big and strong.
💦 I use my trunk to drink water.

animal.question: I hop around and have long ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I like to eat carrots.
🐇 I have a fluffy tail.
🌱 I live in a burrow.

animal.question: I roar and I am the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a big mane.
🥩 I eat meat.
☀️ I live in Africa.

animal.question: I slither and have no legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I shed my skin.
🐁 I eat small animals.
🌿 Some people are afraid of me.

animal.question: I have a shell and move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 I eat plants and vegetables.
🐢 I can hide in my shell.
⏳ I live for a very long time.
